books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange this information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.
books.name: THE RACKETEER

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Eva and Gideon, of “Bared to You,” continue to struggle to make their relationship work.
books.name: REFLECTED IN YOU

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A successful businesswoman tries to make up for past failings with her children, now grown.
books.name: THE SINS OF THE MOTHER

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by Jessica Sorensen
books.description: Childhood friends, long separated, get back together.
books.name: THE SECRET OF ELLA AND MICHA

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: Detective Zach Jordan must stop a deranged killer at a New York film festival.
books.name: NYPD RED

books.author: by Nelson DeMille
books.description: The anti-terrorist task force agent John Corey and his wife, an F.B.I. agent, pursue a high-ranking Qaeda operative in Yemen — who is out to avenge the death of a Libyan terrorist killed by Corey.
books.name: THE PANTHER

books.author: by Patricia Cornwell
books.description: A paleontologist’s disappearance in Canada involves the chief medical examiner Kay Scarpetta; the 20th Scarpetta book.
books.name: THE BONE BED

books.author: by David Mitchell
books.description: Six linked stories involve myriad characters and conflicts: from New Zealand in the mid-19th century to a Belgian estate in the 1930s to 1970s California.
books.name: CLOUD ATLAS

books.author: by Karen Marie Moning
books.description: The first book in a new urban paranormal trilogy set in the world of the Fever series features Dani O’Malley.
books.name: ICED

books.author: by  Sarah Jio
books.description: A Seattle reporter pursues an unsolved abduction from 1933.
books.name: BLACKBERRY WINTER

books.author: by J. K. Rowling
books.description: The sudden death of a parish councilman reveals bitter social divisions in an idyllic English town; a novel for adults by the creator of Harry Potter.
books.name: THE CASUAL VACANCY
